paragraphs.title: Populate ActressesAndActorsDF Reference Data Created In Earlier Setup Reference Data Notebook
paragraphs.text:
val actressesAndActorsDF = sqlContext.sql("SELECT id, name, bio, img FROM actresses_and_actors_perm")
actressesAndActorsDF.show(30)

paragraphs.title: Most Influential Users By Like Graph
Run PageRank On The Like Graph And Enrich With Reference Data
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.graphx._
import org.apache.spark.graphx.util._

val edgeTuples = ratingsDF.map(like => (like(0).toString.toLong, like(1).toString.toLong))

val convergenceThreshold = 0.01

val graph = Graph.fromEdgeTuples(edgeTuples, "", Some(PartitionStrategy.RandomVertexCut))
val pageRank = graph.pageRank(convergenceThreshold).cache()

val topInfluencers = pageRank.vertices.top(10)(Ordering.by(rank => rank._2))
val topInfluencersDF = sc.parallelize(topInfluencers).toDF("user_id", "rank")

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.graphx._
import org.apache.spark.graphx.util._
edgeTuples: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[(Long, Long)] = MapPartitionsRDD[106] at map at <console>:41
convergenceThreshold: Double = 0.01
graph: org.apache.spark.graphx.Graph[String,Int] = org.apache.spark.graphx.impl.GraphImpl@18ca6531
pageRank: org.apache.spark.graphx.Graph[Double,Double] = org.apache.spark.graphx.impl.GraphImpl@276f6e67
topInfluencers: Array[(org.apache.spark.graphx.VertexId, Double)] = Array()
topInfluencersDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [user_id: bigint, rank: double]

paragraphs.title: Enrich the Top Influencers with reference data

result.msg:

| id|name|bio|img|rank|
+---+----+---+---+----+
+---+----+---+---+----+

paragraphs.title: Save Top Influencers to ElasticSearch
paragraphs.text:
import org.elasticsearch.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode

val esConfig = Map("pushdown" -> "true", "es.nodes" -> "demo.fluxcapacitor.com", "es.port" -> "39200")
enrichedTopInfluencersDF.write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql").mode(SaveMode.Overwrite).options(esConfig).save("fluxcapacitor/top-influencers")

result.msg:
import org.elasticsearch.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode
esConfig: scala.collection.immutable.Map[String,String] = Map(pushdown -> true, es.nodes -> demo.fluxcapacitor.com, es.port -> 39200)
